data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pitts, James P., Manley, Donald G. (2004): A Revision of Lomachaeta Mickel, with a new species of Smicromutilla Mickel (Hymenoptera: Mutillidae). Zootaxa 474: 1-27, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.157428
